BUY $BONKKONG 🍌
WHITEPAPER 🦍
  • About
  • Tokenomics
  • Roadmap
  • How to Buy
Menu
  • About
  • Tokenomics
  • Roadmap
  • How to Buy

Where Memes and Bananas Collide! 🍌

BINANCE SMART CHAIN

X-twitter Telegram Telegram-plane

Introducing BONK KONG, the ultimate tribute to the iconic memecoin BONK and the classic game DONKEY KONG. BONK KONG aims to dominate the meme landscape of the 2024 bull run. With a relentless focus on community engagement and a marketing strategy that’s both aggressive and global, BONK KONG is set to revolutionize the world of memecoins.

Token Supply

42.069.000

Tax 5/5

TOKEN HOLDERS

PHASE 1 🙈

  • Token Launch and Community Formation.
  • Introduction of BONKKONG Coin.
  • Launch Events and Engagement.
  • Social Media Activation.
  • Audit, SAFU, KYC.
  • Presale on Pinksale.
  • Contract Renouncement.
  • LP Launched & Liquidity Added.
  • Pre-Launch Marketing.

PHASE 2 🙊

  • Listing on CG/CMC.
  • Complete DApp Development.
  • Launch NFT Marketplace.
  • Airdrops, Rewards Program.
  • Forge Strategic Partnerships.
  • New NFT Introductions.
  • Top 10 CEX Listing.
  • Dextools/Dexview Upgrades.
  • A-ads Marketing Campaigns.
  • Trending on Aggregators.
  • Reach 10,000 Holders.

PHASE 3 🙉

  • Release of BONKKONG Marketplace.
  • NFTs Grant Exclusive Access.
  • BONKKONG Bridge DApp.
  • NFT Interaction Enhancements.
  • Host Art Competitions.
  • Achieve 50,000 Holders Milestone.
  • Organize Buy & Shill Competitions.
  • Trending with $BONKKONG.
  • Support MEME Culture.
  • Unstoppable Momentum.

1. CREATE A WALLET

Download metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play store for free. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going to metamask.io.

2. GET SOME $BNB

Have BNB in your wallet to switch to $BONKKONG. If you don’t have any BNB, you can buy directly on metamask, transfer from another wallet, or buy on another exchange and send it to your wallet.

3. GO TO PANCAKESWAP

Go to pancakeswap.finance in google chrome or on the browser inside your Metamask app. Connect your wallet. Paste the $BONKKONG token address into Pancakeswap, select BONKKONG, and confirm. When Metamask prompts you for a wallet signature, sign.

4. SWITCH $BNB FOR $BONKKONG

Switch BNB for $BONKKONG. We have 5/5 taxes so you don’t need to worry about buying with a specific slippage, although you may need to use slippage during times of market volatility.

FOLLOW THE MONKEY!!

X-twitter Telegram Telegram-plane

$BONKKMONG coin has no association with BluegirlWoomy or his creation Bonk!! (Kong). This token is simply paying homage to a meme and game we all love and recognize.

BONKKONG is a meme coin with no intrinsic value or expectation of financial return. The coin is completely useless and for entertainment purposes only. Any resemblance to Nintendo™ is purely coincidental, and BONKKONG has no association or partnership with the company.

Copyright 2024 @ Bonk Kong
